name: fsumcom
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), csu(s1, c1, csu(s0, c0, c2))))
-| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(c2, cc))
bodyPretty: ⊢ (w0 → sum(s0 ∈ c0, sum(s1 ∈ c1, c2))= sum(s1 ∈ c1, sum(s0 ∈ c0, c2)))
